TextView.android:text: 7x 5kg Pull Ups + 5.5.5. Isometric Hold ---> 7 Pull Ups + 5.5.5. Isometric Hold
x4-5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
8x 5kg Dips ---> 8 Dips
x4-5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Russian Push Ups ---> 10 Straight Bar Dips
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max L-Sit Hold
x6 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
13 Bar Leg Raises
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
8x 70kg Squats ---> 10x 40kg Lunges (E/S)
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30 Squats ---> 1 min Wall Sit with 15kg
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 30kg One Leg Calf Raises (E/S) ---> Max One Leg Calf Raises (E/S)
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
15 Pull Ups ---> 15 Straight Bar Dips ---> 15 Dips
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15 Chin Ups ---> 15 Diamonds ---> 15 Dips
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups
x3-4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
30.30.30. Isometric Hold (Pull Up Grip) ---> 30 Push Ups
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
30.30.30. Isometric Hold (Chin Up Grip) ---> 35 Russian Push Ups
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
50 Squats ---> 90 seconds Wall Sit with 10kg
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
35 Bulgarian Split Squats (E/S) ---> 35 Jumping Lunges
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
35 One-Legged Glute Bridges (E/S)
x3 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
15x 10kg Sit Ups ---> 15x 10kg Roman Twists ---> 45 seconds Hollow Hold with 10kg
x4-5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Optional: 10 Russian Push Ups ---> 10 Diamond Push Ups ---> 10 Push Ups (4 Sets, 90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Beginner Program Level 5 - Week 1
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
This weekly routine should be repeated until 2 sets of 5kg pull ups can be performed without breaking both sets.
